messages.content: comfyui-magic-clothing is a version of the Magic Clothing project that is compatible with ComfyUI. It allows for direct integration with modules such as ipadapter.

To install comfyui-magic-clothing, you can use ComfyUI-Manager or put the code into the custom_nodes folder. Then, download the models from huggingface and move them to the comfyui/models/unet folder.
Where can I find sample files for comfyui-magic-clothing?
You can find sample files for comfyui-magic-clothing in the example.json file.
Where can I find ipadapter sample files for comfyui-magic-clothing?
You can find ipadapter sample files for comfyui-magic-clothing in the ipadapter.json file.
What are some current issues with comfyui-magic-clothing?

Currently, there are problems with the low success rate of some of the adopters, which doesn't work well for dense patterns. The [sigma] parameter serves as a temporary solution to the input scaling of the clothing feature in ComfyUI.
What is the main problem with the first unet sampling in comfyui-magic-clothing?

The main problem with the first unet sampling in comfyui-magic-clothing is the processing issue in model.model_sampling.calculate_input. It is still under research, and a version has been released in the meantime.
